title: Ep. 1001 - The Trans Militants Must Be Stopped
description:
Click here to join Member Block: https://utm.io/ueR8I

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, children’s hospitals around the country are butchering, mutilating, and sterilizing their young patients. New videos reveal just how widespread and depraved this practice is. And that brings us to an important question: what are we going to do about it? I have some ideas. Also, more information is released about the FBI’s fishing expedition at Mar A Lago. And CBS has figured out why kids these days are fat. It’s because of climate change. In our Daily Cancellation, Kamala Harris tries to explain the concept of equity. It doesn’t go well. But in fairness to her, there is no coherent way to explain it. 
 
Stop giving your money to woke corporations that hate you. Get your Jeremy’s Razors today at ihateharrys.com. 

—

Today’s Sponsors:
